knimeNode.name: XPath Table
knimeNode.shortDescription: Derives a table of data from an XML document using XPath

intro.p: This operator extracts data from an XML document using an XPath 1.0 expression

The schema for the extracted data is based upon a sample version of the expected XML, and additionally may have the original source, element, or child elements appended to the data. All data is extracted as Strings. Use the Parse Text Fields operator to validate and convert data.

fullDescription.option: The input field which contains XML data
The XPath expression used to retrieve a set of data.
A sample XML file containing the format of the expected data.
Appends additional information to the data.
